name: grep_repo
description: Search for a text pattern in files under the docs root, optionally filtered by file extension (e.g. only .py files).

pattern.description: Search pattern (substring to find in file contents).

extension.description: Only search files with this extension, e.g. 'py' or 'md'. Optional.

why_it_helps: Users often want to grep only .py or .md files; a dedicated tool avoids repeated read_file + search_docs work.
